1.title: Kevin Hart
1.plot: It's Kevin Hart like you have never seen him before...for a full half-hour episode. Find out everything you never knew about Kevin Hart, from why he uses spit to baptize babies, to explaining why he hires little people to roll with him. Pure uncut comedy from the hottest comedian out right now, hands down.

2.title: Akon/French Montana
2.plot: Meet the man that took Lady Gaga's career from sitting on the shelf to one that would break records around the world. Akon's scope is set for yet a greater goal: to buy Universal. After that, Jennia talks to a new member of the Kardashian family?...French Montana. Originally from Morocco, French tells us about being an immigrant from the third world and his struggle to become successful in rap.

3.title: Usher/Estelle
3.plot: On this episode, Jennia goes to the studio with Grammy Award winning British singer Estelle. Does she prefer sex or shoes? New York or London? And then Jennia flies to NY to sit down for an intimate dialog with none other than Usher. Usher shares some amazing memories from his musical career, and what it was like to working with Michael Jackson.

4.title: Miguel/Soulja Boy
4.plot: Go up close for an intimate dialog with B.E.T. and Grammy award winner Miguel. Miguel took time out of his demanding schedule to share the energy behind his artistry. And then, Jennia chops it up with the controversial Soulja Boy [Love & Hip Hop] and finds out who his celebrity crush is, and how he became the youngest artist in 20 years to write, produce and perform a #1 hit.

5.title: Far East Movement/Les Twins
5.plot: Jennia goes behind the scenes with G6 rappers Far East Movement for a look at what its like flying at 30,000 feet. Then Jennia takes viewers on an rare and intimate interview with the most amazing hip hop dancers in the world, two of Beyonce's favorite dancers: Les Twins.

6.title: Bone Thugs-N-Harmony/Kurupt
6.plot: Backstage with the original members of Bone Thugs N Harmony. Find out their struggles and how they overcame them in this exclusive interview. Then, Jennia sits down with West Coast legend Kurupt. Kurupt talks about being at the center of the East Coast/West Coast beef and holds no punches.

imdb.plot outline: Catch up with the biggest names in urban/pop music for an up close one-on-one exclusive interviews. Host Jennia Fredrique will take you back stage, behind the scenes, on the tour bus and inside the dressing room, for intimate dialogs where your favorite artists share their secrets to success.
imdb.title: Beyond the Talent
plot: Catch up with the biggest names in urban/pop music for an up close one-on-one exclusive interviews. Host Jennia Fredrique will take you back stage, behind the scenes, on the tour bus and inside the dressing room, for intimate dialogs where your favorite artists share their secrets to success.::Full Frequency Media
